mapper.select: select count(*) from m_board where b_type like '%' || #{category} || '%'

select * from (select rownum rnum, b1.* from (select b_no, b.u_no, b_title, b_write_date, b_update_date, b_hit, b_report, b_likes, b_type, u_nick from m_board b, m_user u where b.u_no = u.u_no and b.b_type like '%' || #{category} || '%' order by b_no desc) b1) b2 where rnum between #{paging.startNo} and #{paging.endNo}
select u_nick, b1.* from m_user m, (select * from m_board where b_no = #{bNo}) b1 where m.u_no = b1.u_no
mapper.update: update m_board set b_hit = b_hit + 1 where b_no = #{bNo}
mapper.insert: insert into m_board(b_no, u_no, b_title, b_content, b_type) values(m_board_seq.nextval, #{uNo}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, #{bType})

insert into m_board_img(bi_no, b_no, bi_origin_filename, bi_stored_filename, bi_size, bi_content_type) values(m_board_img_seq.nextval, #{bNo}, #{biOriginFilename}, #{biStoredFilename}, #{biSize}, #{biContentType})
mapper.select: select b_no, b_title, b_content, u_no from m_board where b_no = #{bNo}
mapper.update: update m_board set b_title = #{title}, b_content = #{content} where b_no = #{bNo}
